home.headline: Frontend Developer
home.subline: I'm Vinothkumar, a Frontend Developer at FLY, where I craft intuitive user experiences. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Vinothkumar is a Frontend Developer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant design solutions. Their work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

FLY.achievements: Redesigned the UI/UX for the FLY platform, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and 30% faster load times; Spearheaded the integration of AI tools into design workflows, enabling designers to iterate 50% faster.

Creativ3.achievements: Developed a design system that unified the brand across multiple platforms, improving design consistency by 40%; Led a cross-functional team to launch a new product line, contributing to a 15% increase in overall company revenue.

Build the Future.description: Studied Online Marketing and Personal Branding.

Figma.description: Proficient in prototyping in Figma with Once UI at an accelerated pace.

Nextjs.description: Building next-generation apps using Next.js, Once UI, and Supabase.
